name: Save the Add-on Bar !!
description:
Save the Add-on Bar (going to die in the future FF plans)!! 
simply comment on the official survey of the upcoming (horrible) Australis theme (right now in Nightly) 
 > http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1470920/Survey-Nightly-29
and the interactive mockup is here > http://people.mozilla.org/~shorlander/mockups-interactive/australis-interactive-mockups/windows8.html 
sharing my personal style I hope I will not say "Good bye" to my beloved AddonBar !
additional_info:
The style also include the top TabsBar customization
Show the addon icons on mouse over and autohide on mouse leave
naturally you can customize the text and the color in the content (before: ...Save the... and after: ...Addon Bar !!...)
Perfect with every transparent background style

Updated - Jan.1.2014: the TabBar now have the left\right borders and a little bit less of transparency
